title: User Login Success
description: Verify successful user login with valid credentials and session creation

steps.description: Navigate to authentication login page
Enter valid username/email and password
Submit login form
Confirm user is redirected to main dashboard
Validate session token is set and valid

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify login failure and appropriate error message with invalid username or password

steps.description: Navigate to authentication login page
Enter invalid username/email or password combination
Submit login form
Verify error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials
Ensure no session token or authentication cookie is set

title: Project Creation with Valid Data
description: Verify creating a new project with all required fields succeeds and persists data

steps.description: Navigate to project creation page
Fill project form with valid name, description, priority, and status
Submit the project form
Check new project is saved in database with correct details
Verify project appears in project list and dashboard aggregations update
Confirm audit log entry created for project creation

title: Project Update with Valid Changes
description: Verify editing a project updates appropriate fields and triggers audit logging

steps.description: Navigate to existing project's edit page
Modify project fields (e.g. change priority, status)
Submit form changes
Verify updated fields persist correctly in database
Check audit log records before and after snapshots

title: Project Soft Delete
description: Verify that soft deleting a project updates its status without physical deletion and logs action

steps.description: Trigger delete action on a selected project
Confirm project status changed to deleted instead of data removal
Verify project UUID remains intact and record remains queryable
Check audit log entry captures the delete event with before and after state

title: Task Creation with Multiple Resources and Hour Tracking
description: Verify creating a task assigns multiple resources with estimated hours and initial status Backlog

steps.description: Navigate to task creation page
Fill out task form with name, deadline, assign multiple resources with estimated hours, select status Backlog
Submit the task form
Confirm task is saved with correct resource assignments and hour estimations
Verify task appears in task tables and dashboards reflecting estimated hours
Ensure audit log entry exists for task creation

title: Task Status Workflow Transitions
description: Verify task status transitions follow defined workflow: Backlog -> In Progress -> Done or Cancelled, with validations

steps.description: Create or select a task with status Backlog
Update task status to In Progress
Confirm status update is accepted and persisted
Update task status to Done
Confirm final status is accepted and workflows trigger any completion events
Attempt invalid status transition (e.g. Done back to In Progress)
Verify validation error is shown and status does not change

title: Task Update with Hour Actuals and Resource Utilization Refresh
description: Verify updating task work hours updates resource utilization metrics reflected on dashboards

steps.description: Select a task with assigned resources
Update actual hours worked per resource
Save task updates
Verify actual hours are saved correctly
Confirm dashboard resource utilization charts reflect updated hour values immediately
Check audit logs capture task update event

title: Resource Creation and Role Assignment
description: Verify adding a new resource with correct role and capacity planning information

steps.description: Navigate to resource management page
Add a new resource with name, role, capacity hours
Submit resource creation form
Confirm resource is saved and appears in resource list
Verify capacity planning charts update accordingly
Check audit log entry for resource creation is present

title: Resource Soft Delete
description: Verify soft deleting a resource updates status without data removal and reflects on utilization charts

steps.description: Trigger delete action on selected resource
Verify resource status is updated to deleted and remains in database
Confirm resource is excluded from active capacity and utilization metrics
Check audit log captures resource deletion event

title: Dashboard Real-Time Data Refresh and Filtering
description: Verify dashboard visualizations update in real-time reflecting current data, and filters apply correctly

steps.description: Navigate to main dashboard page
Create or update a project or task affecting relevant metrics
Confirm dashboard charts and statistics update automatically without page reload
Apply filters on status, priority, or resource in dashboard tables
Verify filtered data shown corresponds exactly to filter criteria

title: Search Functionality with Keyboard Shortcuts
description: Verify search inputs on tasks and projects respond in real-time and keyboard shortcuts activate search

steps.description: Navigate to dashboard or task/project listing
Type search query in search input and observe results update immediately
Confirm search results accurately match query input
Use keyboard shortcut to focus search input
Verify search input is focused and ready for typing

title: Export Projects and Tasks to PDF and Excel Formats
description: Verify exporting filtered projects and tasks triggers n8n workflows and results in downloadable reports

steps.description: Navigate to reports page
Apply filters for projects or tasks export
Initiate export to PDF and Excel
Confirm export triggers asynchronous n8n workflow execution
Verify report files are generated matching filter criteria
Validate download link is accessible and secured

title: Theme Preference Persistence and System Preference Detection
description: Verify theme toggling between dark and light mode persists across sessions and respects system preferences

steps.description: Change theme setting to dark mode via UI toggle
Confirm UI updates immediately to dark theme
Reload application
Check dark theme preference persists using localStorage
Set system preference to light mode and reload app with no explicit user selection
Verify app defaults to light theme respecting system preference

title: User Preferences Update for Name and Avatar
description: Verify users can update their display name and avatar which persists and reflects across the app

steps.description: Navigate to user preferences page
Update name and select a new avatar image
Save preferences
Confirm changes persist in backend user profile
Verify updated name and avatar appear in user profile sections in navigation header

title: Form Validation for Project and Task Creation
description: Verify form validations catch invalid inputs, highlight fields inline and prevent submission for invalid data

steps.description: Open project or task creation form
Enter invalid data such as empty required fields, invalid date formats, or non-existent foreign keys
Attempt to submit form
Verify validation errors are shown inline next to invalid fields
Confirm form submission is blocked and no data is written to backend

title: API Centralized Error Handling for Validation and Constraint Errors
description: Verify API returns user-friendly messages for validation errors and database constraint violations

steps.description: Send API requests with invalid payloads triggering Zod schema validation errors
Check API responds with structured validation error messages
Send API requests violating database constraints such as foreign key violations
Verify API returns relevant, descriptive constraint error responses

title: Audit Log Entries on All Data Modifications
description: Verify audit logging captures create, update, delete and restore operations with accurate before and after snapshots and user info

steps.description: Perform data create operation (e.g. create project)
Check audit log entry with new record snapshot and user details
Perform data update operation on existing record
Check audit log entry with before and after snapshots
Perform soft delete operation
Verify audit log entry records deleted status change
Perform restore operation on soft deleted record
Ensure audit log entry captures restored status

title: Navigation Header Accessibility and Functionality
description: Verify navigation header links navigate correctly, theme toggle works, and user profile menu displays

steps.description: Verify header displays links to Dashboard, Tasks, Projects, Reports
Click each link and confirm user navigates to the correct module
Toggle theme button and observe UI theme changes
Confirm theme preference updates persist
Open user profile section in header
Confirm user information and preferences are shown

title: Data Table Sorting, Column Hiding, and Row Actions
description: Verify TanStack React Table supports sortable columns, hiding/showing columns, empty state display and row actions

steps.description: Navigate to task or project listing page with data table
Sort by various columns and verify data order changes accordingly
Hide and unhide table columns using column visibility controls
Confirm columns show/hide correctly
When no data matches filters, confirm empty state message or UI is displayed
Use row action buttons (e.g. edit, delete) and ensure proper operation triggers
